title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.281 - Religious corporation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.281 - Religious corporation

State Regulations
A corporation organized under the Religious Corporations

Law, and other religious agencies and organizations, and charities, agencies
and organizations operated, supervised or controlled by or in connection with a
religious organization. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.281

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
